p: Recent advances in high-throughput molecular epidemiology analysis revealed international links to regional HIV-1 epidemics [ 11]. In this study, we use a large collection of HIV-1 pol sequences in a Northern Californian cohort sampled over 2 decades, and we published pol sequences from other parts of the United States and from outside of the United States to quantify the degree and nature of national and international links in this cohort.
